content: mrsalitre: Opened one issue (#1969) regarding Twitter plugin security alerts due to repeated logins, which was subsequently closed. Created an open PR (#1974) to fix this issue by reusing client-twitter sessions, involving substantial code changes across 1156 files (+43385/-39863 lines). Contributed to discussions by commenting on 2 issues and providing 3 review comments. Activity was concentrated on a single day this month, focusing equally on bugfix and refactoring work.
